featured.text: they seize the pupae of the raided nest.
In time the pupae develop into adults and spend their lives working for the Amazons.

definition.zh_def: 蛹，昆蟲在幼蟲和成蟲之間的發育階段，通常是靜止的。
definition.en_def: Pupae are the life stage of some insects, occurring between the larval and adult stages, often characterized by a period of inactivity.
definition.example: The caterpillar transformed into a pupae before emerging as a butterfly.
